description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Hello,
Thank you for provided informations, we will have a look at it.
Be safe

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

Thanks for providet, data. We will see what we can do.
Be safe
C SIRT

Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm glad we have such great security team!

Dr. Doe

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Greetings,
this website is under attack, hope you have backups of your project.
Please, do not download and browse anything on this website.
We are working on it.
Be safe
C SIRT

Greetings, please, what does it mean under attack?
Jane Taylor

Greetings,
that means that some unauthorized person gained access to some data or infrastructure.
Please, create backups of your project but do not visit the website.
CSIRT

PS: edit: please only change your password for the website, your personal computer should not be threatened.
CSIRT

Thank you!
Already done.
J. Taylor

Good job,
thank you for your cooperation.
CSIRT

Greetings, 
Can our customers access the website under these conditions?
J.Taylor

Your customers should change passwords too.
CSIRT

I will try to do my best but cannot promise IT.
J.T.
We discussed the issue with other colleagues and i cannot ask the customersto do so. We would have neg. Reputation.
Now, i cannot access the website. Did the attack do dome harm?

Now I can finally contact them on my own. I have blocked the website, we are working on it, please be patient.
CSIRT

Oh no, our web needs to stay online as long as possible!

Regards,

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project
